reviews.sentence: I was so excited for my first time stay at the Hard Rock Casino in Atlantic City. I have been in there before to walk through the casino but never actually stayed. Our arrival went super smooth. Our room was ready early there was no long lines at the check in and the staff was super friendly. Only downfall there was we asked for an ocean view was told our room was ocean view. When we walked in the room it was not an ocean view. Hopefully next time we get the view we wanted. Our room was very clean and the decor is very modern. The beds are comfortable and the whole overall feel of the room was great. The only other complaint I have about the room was the hot water. We did not have hot water in the shower. I am not sure the reason why and we were only there one night so I did not escalate the complaint. The casino and hotel itself was really clean. It was vibrant light and airy and had a great vibe to it. We enjoyed walking around looking at all the memorabilia and it was easy to get around. I will stay at this hotel again. It really is a great resort with great entertainment and a wonderful overall feel.
Nice and clean property. Room was very nice will definately come again.

Awesome bday wknd. It was my birthday weekend and I had an amazing time. The room was awesome with a wonderful view of the city. The amenities were great. The casino had a lot of entertainment to offer. Next time I would love to do the spa as well.

Hard rock is an immaculately clean hotel friendly staff and great food. We had no problems with anu aspect of our stay parking check in restaurants check out. Love the hard rock. Planning oyr next trip back.

Hard Rockin. This place had a Great atmosphere that made it comfortable and relaxing. The music was from our era making it nice. All the employees we encountered were great and had good attitudes. The room was very clean and a nice layout. Food spots were good and not crazy money. I would stay here again.

Cheer competition and Birthday. We were there for a cheer competition and from the moment we pulled up to the moment we left it was an excellent experience. It was also my daughters 13th birthday and she enjoyed all of the restaurants and looking at outfits throughout the resort.

This property was designed and structured very well. I really enjoyed the famous music artists and clothes throughout the hallway. However the two times I took a shower the water was cold which delayed my process to check out efficiently and comfortably waiting for the shower to warm up. Unfortunately the water never warmed up. I was quite annoyed. Secondly one of the staff guest agents informed me that I would be able to get the parking fee waived. I was told to retrieve the casino wild card and then head over to the parking department. Another agent stated that this keeps occurring and that unfortunately I would not be able to get reimbursed for the miscomunication. Lastly the self parking was a nightmare and locating the front desk after walking around for an hour lugging suitcases effected our initial experience. I will not be staying at this location again especially for the amount I had to pay for my fiancés birthday trip.

First Time Stay. First time at the Hard Rock Cafe Hotel and it was a great experience. The staff was friendly and very helpful and the scenery was super exciting to see as well. Will be going back fairly soon and would hope for the same experience.

The Hard Rock is a fairly new property and it shows in both good and not so good ways. The facilities and rooms are clean bright and modern. There are decent dining options for different tastes and budgets. However customer service and due diligence is seriously lacking. The housekeeper who cleaned our room LEFT OUR ROOM WIDE OPEN when he. she was done. I do n’t mean the door was unlocked I mean they still left the door propped open. We were gone all day. Thank goodness we utilized the safe and left nothing of value out. Still it is was unnerving. We contacted security but they were pretty indifferent about the situation. They sent a guard up to check out the room and give the “ all clear ” after we had already checked the room. It was pointless at that point. Also the check in process was a bit of a hassle. The person assisting us looked sounded and behaved as if she was 14 and would rather be anywhere but there. The rarity was finding a staff member who was actually pleasant helpful. Was playing the slots and ordered a drink which took 45 minutes to get to me and the order was wrong. Waiter had no apology or explanation but was quick to take his tip. Like I said everything else was above average but the staff needs some serious training in professionalism and mindfulness.

DO NOT GO HERE. WARNINGWe checked into a dirty room. When we called for a manager apparently they were all in a meeting and it took an hour or so to get one. They switched our keys without telling us. They made it up with that but then the next day they never cleaned our room and lied about it and said that we had the do not disturb sign on the door which we did not and the Front desk Michael refused to put me on with a manager. I had to call back and ask to speak to someone else. Took an hour to get someone Ralph who was just as rude who was unhelpful. I have called their corporate office. They said 24 48 hours they would get back to me and its been a week and NOTHING. Rude staff unhelpful and on top of that refused to get a manager for me and then corporate can not even get back to me. DO NOT STAY HERE. HORRIBLE EXPERINCE.

Nothing terribly wrong or right. Rooms were very nice beds were comfortable. Very unimpressed with the updated Hard Rock Cafe. Atmosphere was lacking at new restaurant we could not sit in the original as it was “ too late ”. our service left a lot to be desired and the food presentation quantity has fallen. The biggest complaint however is that we traveled with our 15 year old son and not only did the elevator to our room smell of marijuana our room was no different. It was a let down. We were so excited to stay see the new hotel. It however looked like the Taj had a simple cheap remodel. We got a great last minute rate. Not sure it would be the first choice at regular price next time we visit.

Great Room Great Furnishings One Small Problem. The room was fabulous. Furnishings are great. The only problem was the big screen TV which would not respond to the remote. The housekeeping person switched one out from another room but it did not work either. Probably the TV. We were there just for one night so did not follow up on that. The parking for one night20 for self parking. did seem a little steep and the garage directions are confusing arrows barely visible. A few bucks for maintenance would solve that. Overall though it was a nice stay.

Dirty rooms on arrival. When we got there once again there was a long checkin line. It ’s terrible. The room was not vacuumed and one of the sinks was not clean when we walked in. There was tape on the windows housekeeping said it was a short girl problem. There was tape in other places too from a party that must have taken place before we arrived. We had to call housekeeping to reclean the room. We were unsure if the sheets were changed. One of the duvai covers was put in in reverse my relatives feet were inside it. The bathom floor had a plastic tag from previous guest on the floor. The elevators on checkout took us at least 20 mins to get on one due to overcrowding. It was unacceptable. The elevator floors had stains from spilled coffee for the days we stayed it wax never cleaned up. The service was great otherwise. I have zero complaints about your staff members.

Dirty rooms on arrival. When we got there once again there was a long checkin line. It ’s terrible. The room was not vacuumed and one of the sinks was not clean when we walked in. There was tape on the windows housekeeping said it was a short girl problem. There was tape in other places too from a party that must have taken place before we arrived. We had to call housekeeping to reclean the room. We were unsure if the sheets were changed. One of the duvai covers was put in in reverse my relatives feet were inside it. The bathom floor had a plastic tag from previous guest on the floor. The elevators on checkout took us at least 20 mins to get on one due to overcrowding. It was unacceptable. The elevator floors had stains from spilled coffee for the days we stayed it wax never cleaned up. The service was great otherwise. I have zero complaints about your staff members.
A lot of things to do on site. Room did not look like pictures.

This is my 3rd time staying at the Hard Rock but this experience was just ok. The south tower is basic compared to the North tower. Plumbing is horrible all 3 stays i had to call. The security officer that walk the casino are horrible there was the one white male just rude very ignorant. Also when you pull up to casino there is no where to park to check in only valet the guy said if i was not using valet i needed to self park then check in. i tried to explain i had a elderly that could not do alot of walking he said miss move your car or pay. When i check in only 1 of my rooms were ready which was fine they gave me a key and said they would text me once the room is ready when i finally reach my room keys did not work. I had to luggage a infant and 2 kids just a mess.

Hard Rock Is The Center of Atlantic City. If you want to be at the heart of Atlantic City this is the place. Directly across from the famous Steel Pier and The Wheel Feris Wheel it is a location that will make the kids happy too especially of you are there during warm weather and can enjoy the beach. Granted there is plenty to do for the 21 crowd casinos burlesque comedy and live music but I was surprised how many kids I saw with there. Plenty of great inexpensive places to eat as well as fine dining. it is proximity to at least three other resorts gives you plenty to choose from. I loved the Beach Bar in the shadow of the Steel Pier and all the great live music around the property. did not like the fact that the trams on the boardwalk become infrequent and stop running later at night did not like the long walk from the north tower to to the casino and restaurants but overall it was a nice time.
Notower too farslots pay porlyfod okstafgod.

Good day on 10172018 btw the hours of 830p until 1015p1spoted a roach crawling on the table2caled down to the front desk where I was informed I needed to await housekeeping. Per operated Angel or Angelina3 915 called operator explained it was getting late and I would like to be transferred to a new room. operator Carmalita says I should give it another 20 mins4. Now it ’s 20 mins later call back to the front desk again And was told by Angel or Angelina I need to come down to the front desk and get keys5walk down to to the lobby. Was not greeted by Wiliam as I proceed to show him pictures of the dirty room. he in turns says to me “ Why did n’t I inspect the room before this incident. How was I suppose to know that was my job while I ’m on vacation. I pay your company to make sure things are intact to better enjoy my stay. From this point he hands me room keys to room 1847. I was to await JC the bell man. This takes another 20 mins. So I decide to walk my belongings to the new room assignment. I call down to the front desk to cancel the doorman the operator replies you can do that yourself. I can transfer you. I ’m so heated about the service. I just hang up the phone6. Get to room 1847 and in deed I take pictures the room has rust spots coming down the sink in the bathroom. More dust and spotted carpet. At this time I still have not heard from the front desk. It was just overwhelming to say the least.

The property was clean exciting design friendly staff wonderful venue enjoyed walking around and seeing the clothing and other colectables of the stars. Room was good size and very clean. Complaint. Long waits for the elevators 5 50 expensive to gamble.
